import React from 'react'; import './css/Home.css'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { const todayIndex = new Date().getDay(); // 0 = Sunday const navigate = useNavigate(); const clinicHours = [ { day: 'Sunday', time: '9‚ÄØam ‚Äì 1‚ÄØpm, 4 ‚Äì 9‚ÄØpm' }, { day: 'Monday', time: '9‚ÄØam ‚Äì 1‚ÄØpm, 4 ‚Äì 9‚ÄØpm' }, { day: 'Tuesday', time: '9‚ÄØam ‚Äì 1‚ÄØpm, 4 ‚Äì 9‚ÄØpm' }, { day: 'Wednesday', time: '9‚ÄØam ‚Äì 1‚ÄØpm, 4 ‚Äì 9‚ÄØpm' }, { day: 'Thursday', time: '9‚ÄØam ‚Äì 1‚ÄØpm, 4 ‚Äì 9‚ÄØpm' }, { day: 'Friday', time: '9‚ÄØam ‚Äì 1‚ÄØpm, 4 ‚Äì 9‚ÄØpm' }, { day: 'Saturday', time: '9‚ÄØam ‚Äì 1‚ÄØpm, 4 ‚Äì 9‚ÄØpm' }, ]; const handleBookClick = () => { navigate('/appointmentform'); }; return (

Welcome to Krishna Clinic

Your family's trusted care provider near Bhakti Circle, Ahmedabad.

About Dr. Kashyap Solanki

Dr. Kashyap Solanki (B.A.M.S. GAU) is a qualified and experienced Ayurvedic doctor committed to providing holistic and personalized healthcare. He previously served at Sarthak Medical & ICU Hospital ‚Äì Cura Hospitals.

Registration No: GB-I 22354

Our Services

General Consultation

Diagnosis and treatment for common illnesses and conditions.

Family Health

Care for all ages ‚Äî children, adults, and seniors.

Ayurvedic Treatment

Natural healing using time-tested Ayurvedic principles.

Health Advice

Guidance for diet, immunity, and wellness routines.

Clinic Hours

{clinicHours.map((entry, index) => (

{entry.day}: {entry.time}

))}
